title: Sketchbook Folio, "Four Herms, Studies after the Carracci", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 47 Lodovico Caracci Bologna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: All four drawings of herms flanked by putti and supporting bracket; lower left drawing of herm flanked by male and female satyr, and two female herms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Four Herms, Studies after the Carracci", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3585-a/d.
